no_more_50_words: Especially during warmer times of the year, it's common for kids to go to pools to cool off, becuase swimming at a pool can cool down the body.
50_to_100_words: Going swimming is a common way for people to cool off, especially on hot days. When the kids in this scenario wanted to cool off, they likely decided to go swimming as it is a fun and refreshing activity that can provide relief from the heat. Additionally, swimming is a low-impact form of exercise that can help to increase circulation and lower body temperature. Overall, going swimming is an effective and enjoyable way to cool down, which is likely why the kids chose to do so.
